verses.name: Numbers 6:8
verses.text: All the days of his separation he is holy unto the Lord.

verses.name: Numbers 6:9
verses.text: And if any man die very suddenly by him, and he hath defiled the head of his consecration; then he shall shave his head in the day of his cleansing, on the seventh day shall he shave it.

verses.name: Numbers 6:10
verses.text: And on the eighth day he shall bring two turtles, or two young pigeons, to the priest, to the door of the tabernacle of the congregation:
